intro: Felicia anthemidodes, commonly known as the yellow starbursts, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features bright yellow ray florets surrounding a central disk of smaller, tubular flowers. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Felicia anthemidodes is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ease of care in gardens.
